# Vimeo

Vimeo is a video hosting platform that allows you to upload and share videos.

## Options

| Option  | Description  | Required | Default |
| :------ | :----------- | :------- | :------ |
| id      | Video ID     | Yes      | - -     |
| loading | Loading type | No       | lazy    |

## Example

<!-- embed ignore begin -->

```text
{% embed vimeo id="914391191" loading="lazy" %}
```

<!-- embed ignore end -->

{% embed vimeo id="914391191" loading="lazy" %}
